articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2011-2012)
articles.contents:

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2012-2013)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1213 <- read_rds("clean_1213.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1213 <- clean_1213 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2012-2013)") plot_1213 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[107097,105608,104662,104356,69874],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2013-2014)

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2014-2015)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1415 <- read_rds("clean_1415.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1415 <- clean_1415 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2014-2015)") plot_1415 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[103870,102267,101431,101098,66847],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2015-2016)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1516 <- read_rds("clean_1516.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1516 <- clean_1516 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2015-2016)") plot_1516 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[107700,105456,105238,104020,67948],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2016-2017)

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2017-2018)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1718 <- read_rds("clean_1718.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1718 <- clean_1718 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2017-2018)") plot_1718 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[109191,107258,106112,104758,67204],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2018-2019)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1819 <- read_rds("clean_1819.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1819 <- clean_1819 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2018-2019)") plot_1819 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.899999999999999],"base":[0,0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6,20],"y":[112755,111020,109870,108335,68990,12445],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D
